name: TOEFLAssistant
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toefl assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can get ready for TOEFL test day with the help of Alexa! Featuring a fun quiz to practice your English vocabulary and a comprehensive Q&A option.

Developed by the makers of the TOEFL test, this fun, informative skill can add to your TOEFL test preparation and to your everyday English language learning.

No Amazon Echo device? No worries! You can also use TOEFL® Assistant for Amazon Alexa on your smartphone. Just go to the app store on your mobile device and search for "Alexa app" to get started with an innovative way to prep for the TOEFL® test.

Vocabulary Quiz –
Test your knowledge of English words and phrases! The vocabulary included may be found on the test, but most important, it will be used in and out of the classroom during your university experience.

Come back daily for a new random selection of quiz questions!

Frequently Asked Questions –
If there is a question on your mind about the TOEFL test, registration, using your TOEFL scores or study abroad, just ask! TOEFL Assistant is an easy, quick way to find the answers that will help guide you on your journey.

Some examples of the information TOEFL Assistant can find for you:
“Where are TOEFL test scores accepted?”
“How do I register?”
“What is the Speaking section like?”

As your confidence grows, don’t forget to register for the TOEFL test. Visit toeflgoanywhere.org or ets.org

NOTE: This is a beta version of TOEFL Assistant being tested in the U.S. and India. We will be making updates to continually improve the experience, and we welcome your feedback!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
